content.html: Oh Sweetie, we HAVE freedom of speech/expression, it’s just not called “the 1st amendment” because we are a different country and we have a different constitution. Our Constitution didn’t need to be “amended” to include freedom of speech because WE got it right the first time.
content.value: Oh Sweetie, we HAVE freedom of speech/expression, it’s just not called “the 1st amendment” because we are a different country and we have a different constitution. Our Constitution didn’t need to be “amended” to include freedom of speech because WE got it right the first time.
